comment.body:
I suggest a table view, like this:
```
| IP Number | Port | Code | Country | Version |
| - | -| - | - | - |
| 123.134.185.156 | 1080 | CN | China | Socks5 |
```
And then just replace `-` with `|` (in the text editor). It looks much better (as for me).

> [eibriel](#comment_7_1BYU9zV786auJ29dF3HMAQYhxA2WgN4ofi): Thanks Zalex, apparently my version of ZeroBlog don't support Tables

I turned on "My site" and I made a nice table (in my local copy of your site), it works. Just paste raw markdown like in my comment.
**Note:** second row `| - | - | - | - | - |` is important.
